channel.title: The Count[Neutral Offensive]
channel.description:
Lore: The King's lesser known second son was cast out from the royal family at an early age for being a "monster", or an "aberration", The King, however, pitied his son, and so left him a title and an estate, but now The Count has returned, and cares not for his father's pity, he simply wants the throne for himself
**Passive:** Barely Human - The Count is immune to Death at Night **Passive:** Corrupted Blood - The Count may step up to become The King, however if anyone with Royal Blood steps up, he will be forced to step down **Night Ability 1:** Bloodsucker - Occupy a player, discovering whether they are a Royal - Infinite Uses **Night Ability 2:** Fratricide - Kill a player, if they are not a Royal this attack will fail - 3 uses(cannot be used on The King) **Day Ability 1:** Haunting Whispers - Your next whisper will be completely anonymous
**Objective:** Become the King(you win if this happens and do not have to survive like the neutral king)

item.title: The Count[Neutral Offensive]

item.description:
JammySplodge:

The Count may step up to become The King, however if anyone with Royal Blood steps up, he will be forced to step down

so essentially if any other royals step up he is screwed, as they know he is the count?

JammySplodge:

Fratricide - Kill a player, if they are not a Royal this attack will fail - 3 uses(cannot be used on The King)

so he can’t do anything about the nobles, seeing as they are immune to death at night?

JammySplodge:

Haunting Whispers - Your next whisper will be completely anonymous

Please explain the utility of this ability, as it seems useless.

JammySplodge:

Become the King(you win if this happens and do not have to survive like the neutral king)

So essentially you have to become the king, then sit around doing nothing?
